BlendPower: Blend power controls the shape of the blend between shapes
BlendFalloff: Blend falloff controls the size of the blend region
bVoxWrap: Apply a "VoxWrap" operation to input mesh(es) before computing the blend.  Fixes results for inputs with holes and/or self-intersections.
bRemoveInternalsAfterVoxWrap: Remove internal surfaces from the VoxWrap output, before computing the blend.
ThickenShells: Thicken open-boundary surfaces (extrude them inwards) before VoxWrapping them. Units are in world space. If 0 then no extrusion is applied.
